p.e:
FOR THE BEST EFFECT
TURN OFF YOUR "HELPER LIGHT"

1. TAP ON YOUR RING.

2. TAP ON "ME".

3. TAP ON THE "..." BUTTON, BOTTOM-LEFT.

4. TAP ON THE "MORE" BUTTON, BOTTOM-RIGHT.

5. UNCHECK ""HELPER LIGHT".

6. TAP ON THE "X" TO CLOSE YOUR MENU.

WHILE YOU'RE IN THOSE MENUS, TURN ON
"SMOOTH RIDING ON THINGS" FOR THE BEST
ELEVATOR RIDE EXPERIENCES, IF YOU DON'T
GET SIM SICKNESS.
